title: This is the definition that The Macro Polity authors use for conservative enactments. Policy enactments that are understood as conservative at the time of enactment despite government expansion, such as increased abortion restrictions, are coded as conservative. Their inclusion in the conservative category does not substantially alter the results. My study found 56.6% liberal enactments, 8.9% conservative enactments, and 34.5% neither or both
